addr: Birdcage Walk London, Greater London SW1E 6HQ GB
title: Veterans Aid Carol Service 2015
desc: Veterans Aid is delighted to invite you to join us in the impressive surroundings of the Guards Chapel to celebrate Christmas. In the presence of His Royal Highness The Duke of Edinburgh and with music led by the Band of the Coldstream Guards and the Chapel choir, this sell out event also features readings from famous faces. After the service, join with friends and family to enjoy mulled wine and mince pies at the outdoor reception. Gates open at 18.00 and all attendees must be seated by 18.45. Carol Service will commence promptly at 7pm and conclude at 8pm.? This event is proudly sponsored by: Victoria Business Improvement Distrcit
